languages.text: Worship of the God-Emperor is the central pillar of the Imperium of Man. Each day, trillions of people across a million worlds live, toil, and die in His name.
languages.original_text: Вера в Бога-Императора — основополагающий столп Империума Человечества. Во имя Его миллиарды людей на тысячах миров живут, трудятся и умирают каждый день.

traits.locale_text: Worship of the God-Emperor is the central pillar of the Imperium of Man. Each day, quadrillions of people across a million worlds live, toil, and die in His name.

Worship of the God-Emperor is the central pillar of the Imperium of Man. Each day, trillions of people across a million worlds live, toil, and die in His name.

languages.text: Вера в Бога-Императора — основополагающий столп Империума Человечества. Во имя Его миллиарды людей на тысячах миров живут, трудятся и умирают каждый день.

traits.locale_text: Вера в Бога-Императора — основополагающий столп Империума Человечества. Во имя Его миллиарды людей на тысячах миров живут, трудятся и умирают каждый день.

languages.text: Die Verehrung des Gottimperators ist eine zentrale Säule des Imperiums der Menschheit. Tag für Tag leben, leiden und sterben Billionen von Menschen auf einer Million Welten in Seinem Namen.
languages.original_text: Worship of the God-Emperor is the central pillar of the Imperium of Man. Each day, trillions of people across a million worlds live, toil, and die in His name.

traits.locale_text: Die Verehrung des Gottimperators ist eine zentrale Säule des Imperiums der Menschheit. Tag für Tag leben, leiden und sterben Quadrillionen von Menschen auf einer Million Welten in Seinem Namen.

languages.text: 对神皇的崇拜是人类帝国的核心支柱。在数百万个人类世界之中，数万亿的臣民每天以神皇的名义生活、劳作、死亡。
languages.original_text: Worship of the God-Emperor is the central pillar of the Imperium of Man. Each day, trillions of people across a million worlds live, toil, and die in His name.

traits.locale_text: 对神皇的崇拜是人类帝国的核心支柱。在数百万个人类世界之中，数万亿的臣民每天以神皇的名义生活、劳作、死亡。

languages.text: Le culte de l'Empereur-Dieu est la pierre angulaire de l'Imperium de l'humanité. Chaque jour, des billions de citoyens originaires d'un million de mondes vivent, travaillent et meurent en Son nom.
languages.original_text: Worship of the God-Emperor is the central pillar of the Imperium of Man. Each day, trillions of people across a million worlds live, toil, and die in His name.

traits.locale_text: Cliquez à deux reprises sur le portrait d'un personnage pour centrer la caméra sur ce dernier.
Cliquez à deux reprises sur le portrait d'un personnage pour centrer la caméra sur ce dernier.

Le culte de l'Empereur-Dieu est la pierre angulaire de l'Imperium de l'humanité. Chaque jour, des quadrillions de citoyens originaires d'un million de mondes vivent, travaillent et meurent en Son nom.

languages.text: El culto al Dios Emperador es el pilar central del Imperium de la Humanidad. Cada día, trillones de personas de un millón de mundos viven, trabajan y mueren en su nombre.
languages.original_text: Worship of the God-Emperor is the central pillar of the Imperium of Man. Each day, trillions of people across a million worlds live, toil, and die in His name.

traits.locale_text: El culto al Dios Emperador es el pilar central del Imperium de la Humanidad. Cada día, cuatrillones de personas de un millón de mundos viven, trabajan y mueren en su nombre.

languages.text: 神帝陛下への崇拝は、人類の帝国の大黒柱だ。毎日、100万の世界にまたがる何兆もの人々が、神の名の下に生き、働き、そして死んでいく。
languages.original_text: Worship of the God-Emperor is the central pillar of the Imperium of Man. Each day, trillions of people across a million worlds live, toil, and die in His name.

traits.locale_text: 神帝陛下への崇拝は、人類の帝国の大黒柱だ。毎日、100万の世界にまたがる何兆もの人々が、神の名の下に生き、働き、そして死んでいく。

languages.text: Tanrı İmparator'a tapınma, İnsan İmparatorluğu'nun bel kemiği, temel direğidir. Her gün milyonlarca dünyadaki trilyonlarca insan; İmparator uğruna yaşar, çalışır ve ölür.
languages.original_text: Worship of the God-Emperor is the central pillar of the Imperium of Man. Each day, trillions of people across a million worlds live, toil, and die in His name.
